name: @bytechef/embedded-workspace
description: Workspace for ByteChef Embedded SDK development

scripts.setup:link: cd library/react && npm run build && npm link && cd ../../test-apps/react && npm link @bytechef/embedded-react
scripts.publish:library: cd library/react && npm run build && npm run publish:local
scripts.clean: rm -rf library/react/dist library/react/node_modules test-apps/react/.next test-apps/react/node_modules verdaccio-storage
